interface UserRepository
{
    public function all();
}

class User extends Eloquent implements UserRepository
{
    public static function all(); // comes from Eloquent obviously, but yeah
}

$user = new User;

 // This works as an instance call, even though it's declared as static,
 // standard PHP behaviour, but PHP will complain that User isn't
 // implementing the interface, because the interface defines it as an
 // instance method. Grr!
$user->all();
